info.title: apaleo Rate Plan API
info.description: Manage the rate plans and rates to rent out your inventory and extra services.

get.description:
Get an age category by id.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'settings.read, setup.read, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the age category.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: 'all' or comma separated list of two-letter language codes (ISO Alpha-2)

200.description: Return all the age category data.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

patch.description:
Here is the list of operations that are currently allowed: - Replace name, minimum age and maximum age


You must have at least one of these scopes: 'settings.manage, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the age category to be modified.

requestBody.description: Define the list of operations to be applied to the resource. Learn more about JSON Patch here: http://jsonpatch.com/.

schema.description: Define the list of operations to be applied to the resource. Learn more about JSON Patch here: http://jsonpatch.com/.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

delete.description:
Use this call to delete an age category. You can only delete an age category if it is not already used in a rate plan to define age specific prices.

You must have at least one of these scopes: 'settings.manage, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the age category.

204.description: Deletion of the age category was successful.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

post.description:
Use this call to create a new age category. The age ranges for categories must not overlap each other and the allowed values span from 0 to 17.

You must have at least one of these scopes: 'settings.manage, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description:
Unique key for safely retrying requests without accidentally performing the same operation twice. 
We'll always send back the same response for requests made with the same key, 
and keys can't be reused with different request parameters. Keys expire after 24 hours.

requestBody.description: The definition of the age category.

201.description: Creation of the new age category was successful.

Location.description: The location of the created resource.

schema.description: The location of the created resource.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

Get the list of age categories.

get.description:
Get the list of companies.

You must have at least one of these scopes: 'companies.read, companies.manage'.

parameters.description: Filter by the specified property

parameters.name: ratePlanIds
parameters.description: Return companies with any of the specified rate plans

parameters.name: corporateCodes
parameters.description: Return companies that have any of the requested corporate codes

parameters.name: textSearch
parameters.description:
This will filter all companies for the provided free text.
Currently it only looks up if the company name contains one of the provided values

get.description:
Returns all rates for a specific rate plan within the specified time range. If a rate has not been initialized, it will still be returned, but anything besides the from and to values will be empty. The time range of a rate is defined by the time slice definition of the rate plan.
Time ranges with no initialized rates will not be available for sell.

To be able to read rates for a corporate rate plan a client must additionally have the 'rateplans.read-corporate' scope.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'rates.read, rates.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the rate plan.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
The start of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is equal or later than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is earlier than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting from 1 and defaulting to 1. Results in 204 if there are no items on that page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. If this is not set, the pageNumber will be ignored and all values returned.

200.description: Return all rates for a rate plan.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

put.description:
All rates specified in the request will be initialized, or overwritten if they already exist.

Make sure that the from and to date and time in the rates match the time slice definition of the rate plan. The easiest way to achieve this is calling the GET /rate-plans/{id}/rates for the time range you want to update and then resend the payload with the set prices and restrictions.
You must have this scope: 'rates.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the rate plan.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

delete.description:
Deletes all rates in the specifed time range.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'rates.delete, rates.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the rate plan.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
The start of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is equal or later than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is earlier than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

204.description: Delete of the rates was successful.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

get.description:
To be able to count rates for a corporate rate plan a client must additionaly have the 'rateplans.read-corporate' scope.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'rates.read, rates.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the rate plan.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
The start of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is equal or later than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is earlier than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

patch.description:
Note that the specified PATCH operations are applied to each and every rate for the specified time range. Here is the list of operations that are currently allowed: - Add, replace and remove Price - Add, replace and remove Restrictions
You must have this scope: 'rates.manage'.

parameters.name: ratePlanIds
parameters.description: Filter rates for patching by rate plan ids

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
The start of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is equal or later than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to filter the rates by. All rates where the from date and time is earlier than the specified date and optional time will be affected
Specify either a pure date or a date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

parameters.name: weekDays
parameters.description: The weekdays that will be patched. If not specified, all weekdays will be patched.

requestBody.description: Define the list of operations to be applied to the resource. Learn more about JSON Patch here: http://jsonpatch.com/.

schema.description: Define the list of operations to be applied to the resource. Learn more about JSON Patch here: http://jsonpatch.com/.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

get.description:
Get the list of rate plans depending on client scopes.

If a client has no additional scopes, only public rate plans are returned.
The 'rateplans.read-corporate' scope adds corporate rate plans to the response.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'rateplans.read, setup.read, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: Return rate plans for the specific property

parameters.name: ratePlanCodes
parameters.description: Return rate plans filtered by requested codes

parameters.name: includedServiceIds
parameters.description: Return rate plans that have any of the requested included services

parameters.name: channelCodes
parameters.description: Return rate plans that are sold though any of the specified channels

parameters.name: promoCodes
parameters.description: Return rate plans that have any of the requested promo codes

parameters.name: companyIds
parameters.description: Return rate plans filtered by requested companies

parameters.name: baseRatePlanIds
parameters.description: Return rate plans derived from any of the specified rate plans

parameters.name: unitGroupIds
parameters.description: Return rate plans with any of the specified unit groups

parameters.name: timeSliceDefinitionIds
parameters.description: Return rate plans with any of the specified time slice definitions

parameters.name: unitGroupTypes
parameters.description: Return rate plans with any of the specified unit group types

parameters.name: timeSliceTemplate
parameters.description: The time slice template, defaults to 'over night'

parameters.name: minGuaranteeTypes
parameters.description: Return rate plans with any of the specified min guarantee types

parameters.name: cancellationPolicyIds
parameters.description: Return rate plans with any of the specified cancellation policies

parameters.name: noShowPolicyIds
parameters.description: Return rate plans with any of the specified no-show policies

parameters.name: isDerived
parameters.description: Return only derived or base rate plans

parameters.name: derivationLevelFilter
parameters.description:
This will filter rate plans based on their derivation level.
You can provide an array of string expressions which all need to apply.
Each expression has the form of 'OPERATION_VALUE' where VALUE needs to be of the valid format of the property type and OPERATION can be:
'eq' for equals
'neq' for not equals
'lt' for less than
'gt' for greater than
'lte' for less than or equals
'gte' for greater than or equals
For instance
'eq_5' would mean the value should equal 5
'lte_7' would mean the value should be less than or equal to 7

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting from 1 and defaulting to 1. Results in 204 if there are no items on that page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. If this is not set, the pageNumber will be ignored and all values returned.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: List of all embedded resources that should be expanded in the response. Possible values are: property, unitGroup, cancellationPolicy, services, bookingPeriods, surcharges, ageCategories. All other values will be silently ignored.

200.description: Return all rate plans available within the client scopes.

204.description: There are no rate plans found.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

post.description:
Use this call to create a new rate plan. The rate plan will already contain empty rates, fill them later using PUT rates.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'rateplans.create, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description:
Unique key for safely retrying requests without accidentally performing the same operation twice. 
We'll always send back the same response for requests made with the same key, 
and keys can't be reused with different request parameters. Keys expire after 24 hours.

requestBody.description: The definition of the rate plan.

201.description: Creation of the new rate plan was successful.

Location.description: The location of the created resource.

schema.description: The location of the created resource.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

If a client has no additional scopes, only public rate plans are counted.
The 'rateplans.read-corporate' scope adds corporate rate plans to the result number.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'rateplans.read, setup.read, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: derivationLevelFilter
parameters.description:
This will filter rate plans based on their derivation level.
You can provide an array of string expressions which all need to apply.
Each expression has the form of 'OPERATION_VALUE' where VALUE needs to be of the valid format of the property type and OPERATION can be:
'eq' for equals
'neq' for not equals
'lt' for less than
'gt' for greater than
'lte' for less than or equals
'gte' for greater than or equals
For instance

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description:
Unique key for safely retrying requests without accidentally performing the same operation twice. 
We'll always send back the same response for requests made with the same key, 
and keys can't be reused with different request parameters. Keys expire after 24 hours.

ratePlans.description: Rate plans that can be booked by this company

corporateCode.description:
Optional rate plan code that is used by the company. Default is companyCode-ratePlanCode.
Same code can be specified for several rate plans in one company.
No two companies can have a rate plan with the same code.

code.description: The code for the no-show policy, used to assemble its id

name.description: The name for the no-show policy

description.en: 100% of the accommodation fees, for the complete stay.
description.de: 100% of the accommodation fees, for the complete stay.

baseRatePlanId.description:
The id of the rate plan that will be used as base when calculating the rates.
The derivation level of the rate plan used as base rate plan cannot be greater than 2

value.description:
The value used to control the calculation of the difference to the rates of the defined base
rate plan. It can be a positive and a negative value. The system will prevent you to define
a value that would lead to negative rates

id.description: Rate plan ID that is used by this company

corporateCode.description:
Optional rate plan code that is used by this company. Default is companyCode-ratePlanCode.
Same code can be specified for several rate plans in one company.
No two companies can have a rate plan with the same code.

code.description: The code for the rate plan that can be shown in reports and table views

propertyId.description: The id of the property for which the rate plan will be created

unitGroupId.description: The id of the unit group offered with this rate plan

cancellationPolicyId.description: The id of the cancellation policy valid for this rate plan

noShowPolicyId.description: The id of the no-show policy valid for this rate plan

channelCodes.description: The channel codes the rate plan is sold through

promoCodes.description:
The rate codes for promotional and hidden rates. If at least one code is set the rate will be not publicly visible
anymore and only be offered when one of the promo codes is given in the offer request.
For backward compatibility it is still not possible to set multiple promo codes.

isSubjectToCityTax.description:
Whether the rate plan is subject to city tax or not.
Default value is {true}

timeSliceDefinitionId.description: Defines the time periods for which the unit group related to this rate plan is rented out

name.description: The name for the rate plan

description.description: The description for the rate plan

bookingPeriods.description: Time periods when the rate plan is bookable

surcharges.description:
Additional charges for more than single occupancy. The percent or absolute value will be added to
the manually defined or calculated derived rates.
The values for 'adults' must be unique within the list and starting from occupancy of 2 adults. Values higher than the maximum unit group occupancy will be silently ignored.
The surcharges are required for all possible occupancies defined by the 'MaxPersons' of the unit group.

companies.description: Companies that can use this rate plan

accountingConfigs.description:

This is a temporary field, avoid using it.

percent.description: Percent to take from the base. Must be between 0 and 100.

limit.description:
If set, limits the calculation base to the specified number of time slices, starting from the beginning.
If not set, the entire stay will be used as a base.

includeServiceIds.description:
Services included in the calculation base. If none are set, only charges for the unit will be used.
The services are only included, if they are part of the rate plan. Extra services are ignored.

hours.description: The number of hours within the period

days.description: The number of days within the period

months.description: The number of months within the period

value.description:
The value used to control the calculation of the difference to the rates of the defined base
rate plan. It can be a positive and a negative value

or agreement between the hotel and an organization

to.description:

calculatedPrices.description: A list of prices for occupancies 2 or higher. Only set, if the rate plan defines surcharges for different occupancies

surcharges.description:
Additional charges for the current age category. The absolute value will be added to the manually defined or calculated derived rates.
The values for 'adults' must be unique within the list, and starting from 1. Values equal or higher than
the maximum unit group occupancy will be silently ignored.

The minimum length of stay in order to book the rate. If at least this number
of time slices are covered by the stay duration the rate will be offered.

maxLengthOfStay.description:
The maximum length of stay in order to book the rate. If not more than this number
of time slices are covered by the stay duration the rate will be offered.

closed.description: Whether the rate can be booked for a stay-through reservation

closedOnArrival.description: Whether the rate can be booked on the reservation's arrival date

closedOnDeparture.description: Whether the rate can be booked on the reservation's departure date

to.description: The last date when the rate plan has rates set

property.name: Demo Hotel Munich
property.description: This is the demo hotel Munich

value.description: The percent or absolute value (in the rate plan's currency) of the surcharge

MinGuaranteeType.title: MinGuaranteeType
MinGuaranteeType.description:
The minimum guarantee to be provided when this rate plan is booked so
the reservation will be guaranteed to the guest

Mode.title: Mode
Mode.description:
You can choose if the service will only be offered
for the arrival or departure time slice like early check-in or a final cleaning service. You can also define
a service that is available to be booked for the whole stay. The property defaults to 'Daily'.

PriceCalculationMode.title: PriceCalculationMode
PriceCalculationMode.description:
The calculation mode is used when calculating the adults' surcharges and derived rates.
Defaults to Truncate. Example: for a rate of 125.99 and a surcharge of +10%,
when Truncate is selected, the result would be 125.99 + 12 = 137.99
When Round is selected, the result would be 125.99 + 12.60 = 138.59

PricingMode.title: PricingMode
PricingMode.description: Whether the service price is included in or added to the base rate. The property defaults to `Included`.

PricingUnit.title: PricingUnit
PricingUnit.description: Defines the granularity for which this item is offered and priced.

PricingUnit1.title: PricingUnit1
PricingUnit1.description: Defines per which unit (flat, room, person) this item is offered and priced

PricingUnit2.title: PricingUnit2
PricingUnit2.description: Defines the granularity (room, person) for which this item is offered and priced

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description:
The due date for the cancellation policy will be calculated based on this reference point, and the defined time period.

Examples:
- 1 day and 12 hours prior to arrival
- 0 prior to arrival (meaning, cancellations are always free)
- 24 hours after booking
- 0 after booking (meaning, cancellations ar never free)

Reference2.title: Reference2
Reference2.description: The due date for the cancellation policy will be calculated based on this reference point

ServiceType1.title: ServiceType1
ServiceType1.description: The service type, used by accounting to determine the correct revenue account

Template.title: Template
Template.description: The template used by the time slice defintion

Type.title: Type
Type.description:
The type used to control the calculation of the difference to the rates of the defined base
rate plan

VatType1.title: VatType1
VatType1.description: VAT that applies for the fee

VatType2.title: VatType2
VatType2.description: The vat type, used by accounting to determine the correct vat amount and account

scopes.availability.manage: This scope allows to modify the availability
scopes.folios.payment-with-charges: Requires you to provide a list of charges being covered by the payment
scopes.folios.read: Read folios, including charges and payments
scopes.invoices.read: Retrieve invoices and preview invoices as data or PDF
scopes.reservations.force-manage: Modify stay dates regardless of availability or restrictions
scopes.setup.manage: This scope allows the app to modify settings and configurations for the whole account and all properties, including creating, modifying and deleting units, unit groups, rate plans and properties.
scopes.setup.read: This scope allows the app to read settings and configurations for the whole account and all properties, including reading units, unit groups, and rate plans.
scopes.distribution:reservations.manage: Create and modify bookings and reservations
